game.name: Ellie Cinema Flirting
game.description:
Watching movies is one of the best things loves like to do during their romantic dates! Today we have brought to you a brand new girls game where beautiful Ellie wants to spend some quality time with her boyfriend at the cinema. They both are new to this experience so this lovely couple needs your help to have a great time together. Could you help them out? Join Ellie Cinema Flirting and be prepared to help them flirt and have a nice time together!

When you join this HTML5 romantic game, make sure that they can share their opinions on the movie and get the best time by kissing each other and eating popcorn together. Try to Keep your fingers on your mouse or tap the screen and capture their kissing moments finely and then get ready to help them to pick up the nice outfits! Dress up them with the wonderful trendy and modern outfits and then given them a nice hairstyle in this one of the best dressing games!

Take their picture and frame their photo and keep it as a wonderful treasure for them! We are pretty sure that they would like to cherish their memory forever. Make sure that they will keep kissing each other until the love bar in the bottom part of the screen fills up. Give Ellie an elegant blue outfit or a wonderful pink crop top and pair it with a brown skirt! Her boyfriend will look awesome in a purple shirt with black pants. Good luck to have a blast in this love game and try out more free romantic games without download on atmegame.com!
